name: Invasion: Neo Earth Demo
description:
2087 - A freak meteorite shower brings unwelcome visitors from space. Take command of Earth's Defence Forces in this simple-to-grasp game of turn-based strategic action. Command futuristic soldiers, mechs, tanks and jets on battlefields across a cyberpunk world. Customize the weaponry of every unit at your disposal with guns, lots of guns. Choose your battles and make your war against a covenant of varied alien species.

Currently in development by IAO Games, the most recent demo build is 0.1.1, expect further updates / patches soon.
